responses: You can create a new account from the homepage of our website
Just go to our website and follow the 'Sign Up' link to create a new account
A new account can be created on our website. Just apply to get started.

patterns: It won't let me log in
responses: You can login to our website from the homepage of our website
Just go to our website and follow the 'Sign In' link to login
Access you account using the 'Sign In' button from the homepage.

patterns: I need to reset my password
forgot the password to my account
responses: To reset your password use the 'Forgot Password?' link on the Sign In page.
We can send you a password reset link. Simply hit 'Forgot Password?' on the login page.

Contact us at: support@boutsy.com

patterns: I want to know about pay outs
I would like to know how I get paid
responses: Vendors are paid at the end of each week to the payment method configured through bill.com. You will receive payment automatically once your account reaches a revenue of $250 or more. To request an early payout or for information regarding payments, please reach us at support@email.com.

patterns: I want to file a complaint

I would like to file a complaint
responses: Please provide us your complaint in order to assist you
Please mention your complaint. We will reach out to you to remedy any inconvenience caused.
What complaint would you like to file. We're always trying to improve.
We're listening and we'll file your complaint with out customer experience team.
